title: Athletism — Climbing (Elite) — Phase 4: Max Strength — Lower & Eccentric Control
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Weighted vest, sandbags, farmer carry handles
Rock shoes, approach shoes, helmet, rope (as needed)
goal: Improve descent strength, single‑leg control, and knee/ankle robustness.

warmup: Activation 8' (scap control, deep core, glute med)
Easy traverse or banded forearm prep 5'
main: Safety Bar Squat 5x3; Bulgarian Split Squat 4x5/leg (2s pause)

notes: Week 1: 4x4; Week 2: 5x3. Include downhill eccentric work.
